alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 22 at 1:36AM PST until February 25 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. 9 to 18 inches of snow from 1,000 to 3,000 feet. 18 to 30 inches of snow from 3,000 to 4,000 feet. 3-4 feet of snow above 4,000 feet with isolated amounts up to 6 feet. Winds could gust as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Kern River Valley, Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
